title: Coffee Break: Trump Insider Deals Hitting the Rocks?
description: Trump insider deals in crypto, AI, and drones appear to be taking a hit, mirroring his rapidly declining public support. What will this mean for AI czar David Sacks, Anduril's Palmer Luckey, the Lutnicks and especially Don Junior and Eric?
content:
Trump insider deals in crypto, AI, and drones seem to be taking a hit to match his rapidly dropping public support.
